PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-12282017-10-05ECCC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada National Parks Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the National Parks of Canada Wilderness Area Declaration Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the NATIONAL PARKS OF CANADA WILDERNESS AREA DECLARATION REGULATIONS in order to align with changes to Schedule 5 to the Canada National Parks Act that reconfigured the leasehold boundary of the Marmot Basin Ski Area by permanently removing the Whistlers Creek area and surrounding up-slopes from the Ski Area leasehold.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0218 Publication Date: 2017-10-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the National Parks of Canada Wilderness Area Declaration Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the NATIONAL PARKS OF CANADA WILDERNESS AREA DECLARATION REGULATIONS in order to align with changes to Schedule 5 to the Canada National Parks Act that reconfigured the leasehold boundary of the Marmot Basin Ski Area by permanently removing the Whistlers Creek area and surrounding up-slopes from the Ski Area leasehold.
